title: What happens if an employee gets in an accident on the job or while driving a company vehicle? - Quora
tags: Jobs and Careers at Specific Companies

response.answer_text: Generally the company must ensure he is meted with proper treatment medically and paid leave etc as expedient directly or through its accident insurance .Having said you need to check on whether the person is tacitly or otherwise authorized to drive company vehicle.Person driving should have valid DL. You. Need to ensure he was not under influence of alcohol so that matter is not twisted or delayed.

Injured on duty - should get treatment at company's cost, usually there is provision for reimbursement of medical expenses/treatment at company approved/authorized hospitals/medical insurance for employee/etc.
